t: Sterling looks to the future - Big Furniture Group
s: July 11, 2024 - As John revealed, Sterling has plans to expand the Sterling Home fascia to 10 to 12 showrooms from the existing six over the next few years, while its Forrest Furnishing brand will also see an expansion, with 10-15 stores planned to open too.

t: About Us - Sterling Home
s: Our ambition is to furnish and finish local homes with quality goods, from our family to yours. We want to be true to our founding principles and the DNA of our business that has been formed for over 50 years. In simple terms, what makes us unique is that Sterling is a family, with family at the heart of everything we do. We're a family business, selling to generations of families.
